item.description:
Some friends & I are going out dancing at Wicked Wolf! (formerly the Playwright). Come on and dance!

If you're only a "Maybe", please put a comment in your RSVP.

We'll meet at 9pm, hang-out, and at some point get dancing.

The dance room is supposed to open at 9. If you're definitely coming and aren't too shy to "start" a dance floor, I'm happy to meet earlier (8pm?), and get dancing sooner. Let me know, I'll change the start time.

There's a $10 cover. Or for $15 you get 1 drink + free BAR pizza until 10pm (a special they're having that night). Or buy ticket in advance (203-288-CAMP) for $10 and get the free drink and pizza.

The music at Wicked Wolf is usually like what you'd hear on 101.3FM

DINNER BEFORE? I probably can't, but I MAY end up downtown earlier to eat anyway. If you want to join, email me your cell and I'll text you if that happens.

HOW TO FIND US: We may hang-out in front first. Regardless, just text me (203-901-4957) when you're close to the venue to give some time for me to notice your text. If it helps, I'm tall (6'3").

HOST: Jason, cell # in my RSVP (noisy club, texting probably best)

PARKING: I always find free street parking easily northeast of the green...Temple St, Grove St, etc. Or look at New Haven's parking garage map here
item.how_to_find_us: Text me when you're close to arriving. Also, I'm tall, 6'3"
item.name: Fri 1/14 - Friday dancing!
